## FunctionInputNode.(constructor)

Creates a new function input node

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor();
```

## Remarks

Initializes with: - Default type: vec4 - Auto-generated name: arg\_N (where N is an incrementing counter) - One output slot to provide the parameter value within the function
